author: Yannick Bergeron
title: Saoul, gelé, sans permis et à contresens sur l’autoroute, il tue un automobiliste | Radio-Canada
text: Saoul, gelé, sans permis et à contresens sur l’autoroute, il tue un automobiliste En plus d'être sous l'influence de l'alcool et la drogue, Salvador Ramirez-Nolasco ne détenait pas de permis de conduire valide. Photo : Facebook Salvador Ramirez Un conducteur complètement ivre, qui a tué un autre automobiliste en conduisant en sens inverse, sur l'autoroute Robert-Bourassa, a difficilement reconnu sa culpabilité jeudi au palais de justice de Québec. Salvador Ramirez-Nolasco avait trois fois la limite d'alcool dans le sang et avait consommé du cannabis lorsqu'il a percuté le véhicule conduit par Mario Fleury, qui est mort à 59 ans. Sa conjointe, Linda Seaburn, a également été blessée sévèrement dans la collision, survenue dans la nuit du 17 février 2023. Le véhicule dans lequel prenaient place les victimes. Photo : Radio-Canada / Steve Jolicoeur Le chauffard de 29 ans a finalement été déclaré coupable en fin d'après-midi, après avoir tergiversé toute la journée devant une quinzaine de proches des victimes. Ramirez-Nolasco a expliqué qu'il ne se souvenait pas des événements, provoquant plusieurs pauses dans la journée pour qu'il puisse rencontrer son avocate. Sa conduite devant le Tribunal a d'ailleurs suscité des murmures d'indignation dans la salle d'audience. Drame filmé L'avocat de la poursuite a présenté des séquences vidéos qui montrent la voiture de Ramirez-Nolasco circulant en sens inverse jusqu'au moment où il heurte le véhicule des victimes. Madame Seaburn a préféré sortir de la salle avant que les images soient projetées dans la salle d'audience. On y voit la voiture du chauffard rouler sur l'autoroute qu'il a empruntée à contresens à partir du boulevard Laurier. Pendant 5 km Il croise d'autres véhicules avant de frapper les victimes à la hauteur du boulevard Père-Lelièvre, après avoir circulé dans le mauvais sens pendant près de cinq kilomètres, avec sa conjointe à ses côtés. Cette dernière n'a pas été blessée sérieusement, mais Ramirez-Nolasco a souffert d'une importante hémorragie dans son abdomen. Gravement blessé, Mario Fleury est mort peu de temps après son arrivée à l'hôpital et sa conjointe Linda Seaburn a souffert de lacérations profondes à la tête. Mario Fleury qui a succombé à ses blessures et sa conjointe, Linda Seaburn. Photo : Facebook Mario Fleury Lors de l'enquête sur remise en liberté du chauffard, l'année dernière, la poursuite a expliqué que la sexagénaire souffrait de perte de mémoire à court terme, en raison de l'impact. Elle avait dû se faire annoncer à au moins cinq reprises le décès de son conjoint, en raison de ses pertes de mémoire. Salavador Ramirez-Nolasco a été déclaré coupable de conduite dangereuse et de conduite avec les facultés affaiblies, causant la mort et des lésions. L'es lieux de la collision sur l'autoroute Robert-Bourassa, à la hauteur de Père-Lelièvre. Photo : Radio-Canada / Steve Jolicoeur Sans permis valide En plus de ne pas être en état de conduire, l'homme d'origine latino-américaine n'avait pas le droit de le faire. Quelques jours avant le drame, il avait reçu pour une deuxième fois un constat d'infraction pour avoir conduit sans détenir un permis valide. Le chauffard est détenu pendant le processus judiciaire. Il reviendra devant le juge Thomas Jacques au mois de septembre pour les observations sur la peine. Il fait aussi face à un avis d'expulsion du Canada que les Services frontaliers comptent exécuter, à l'expiration de sa peine.

author: TBS
title: Cassie looks relaxed amidst Sean 'Diddy' Combs' incarceration | Marca
text: Cassie was seen relishing her time in New York City, exuding positivity as she dined at the chic "Left Bank" on Wednesday. The singer seemed at ease, smiling and animatedly sharing something from her phone with friends during the al fresco meal, clearly soaking in the city's vibrant atmosphere, although she was showing little-to-no concern about the elephant in the room... her ex. Diddy is navigating a much darker chapter. After being denied bail, the music mogul has been returned to MDC Brooklyn, a facility known for its harsh conditions. Diddy's attorney, Marc Agnifilo, has criticized these conditions as "inhumane," reflecting the severity of his current predicament. Cassie Ventura was smiling as she stepped out in NYC, just miles from where her ex Sean "Diddy" Combs is locked up. https://t.co/G9s8kWic2B? ExtraTV (@extratv) September 19, 2024 Sean Combs facing a serious legal challenge The timing of Cassie's public outing is particularly poignant given the recent legal developments involving Diddy. The case against him has been thrust into the spotlight with the release of 2016 hotel surveillance footage that captured a troubling incident linked to Diddy. Although Cassie was not explicitly named in the footage, Assistant U.S. Attorney Emily Johnson referenced it in court to underscore Diddy's alleged misconduct. Johnson argued that the footage reveals a pattern of problematic behavior by Diddy, suggesting that the issues with Cassie might only represent the beginning of a larger issue. She indicated that the case involving Diddy could involve more serious allegations, with multiple sex workers potentially revealing even deeper problems. As Cassie enjoys her newfound freedom and the positive buzz of her public life, Diddy's legal battles continue to unfold, highlighting the stark contrast between their current situations. Whilst it's unclear the extent to which Cassie was a victim of her former partner, it's clear that in these situations there is a dam effect. The first few accusations put a crack in the walls, and then the rest start to follow... causing the dam to burst as it were.

author: shafaq
title: ACE Lobe Pumps: Revolutionizing Custom Pumping Solutions
text:
Introduction In the world of industrial pumping solutions, ACE Lobe Pumps stands out as a beacon of innovation and reliability. As China’s leading manufacturer of custom pumping solutions, ACE has been at the forefront of addressing complex production challenges across various industries. This blog post delves into the world of ACE lobe pumps , exploring their product range, applications, and the unique advantages they bring to the table.
The ACE Advantage ACE Lobe Pumps has carved a niche for itself in the competitive landscape of pump manufacturing. With a focus on custom-made pumping and mixing solutions, ACE has become the go-to choice for businesses seeking to optimize their production processes. The company’s commitment to quality and precision is evident in its use of globally advanced processing equipment and tooling molds, ensuring that each pump meets the highest standards of performance and durability.
Diverse Product Range One of ACE’s key strengths lies in its extensive product range. The company manufactures over 100 pump models, with power ratings spanning from 0.75KW to 95KW. This diverse portfolio allows ACE to cater to a wide array of industrial needs, from small-scale operations to large industrial setups. Each pump is designed with precision, keeping in mind the specific requirements of different industries and applications.
Versatile Applications ACE Lobe Pumps find applications across numerous industries, showcasing their versatility and adaptability. Some of the key sectors where ACE pumps excel include:
Food Processing: Ensuring hygienic and efficient handling of food products Dairy Industry: Providing gentle pumping solutions for sensitive dairy products Brewing: Offering precise pumping for various stages of the brewing process Chemical Manufacturing: Handling corrosive and sensitive chemicals with care Paper Recycling: Facilitating efficient processing in paper recycling plants Why Choose ACE LOBE PUMP? Choosing ACE Lobe Pumps comes with a host of benefits that set them apart in the industry:
Maximized Operational Uptime: ACE pumps are known for their reliability, ensuring consistent production-level performance and minimizing downtime. Enhanced Product Quality: The pumps employ low shear forces and less aggressive techniques, preserving the integrity of the pumped products. Hygienic Design: With a focus on product safety and quality, ACE pumps feature hygienic designs and proven cleaning methodologies. Process Flexibility: These pumps efficiently handle both conventional liquid products and high-viscosity media, offering versatility in various applications. Compliance with Standards: ACE pumps meet hygienic standards for general, food-grade, and pharmaceutical processing applications, ensuring regulatory compliance. Commitment to Custom Solutions At the heart of ACE’s success is its unwavering commitment to addressing unique production challenges. The company doesn’t believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. Instead, ACE works closely with clients to understand their specific needs and production hiccups. This approach allows them to provide tailored pumping solutions that not only meet but often exceed client expectations.
Advanced Manufacturing Capabilities ACE’s advanced manufacturing capabilities play a crucial role in delivering high-quality pumps. The company invests in state-of-the-art equipment and continuously updates its manufacturing processes to stay ahead of industry trends. This commitment to technological advancement ensures that ACE Lobe Pumps are always at the cutting edge of pump technology.
Focus on Quality and Reliability Quality and reliability are not just buzzwords at ACE; they are the cornerstones of the company’s philosophy. Each pump undergoes rigorous quality checks and testing procedures before it leaves the factory. This meticulous attention to detail ensures that every ACE Lobe Pump delivers exceptional performance and longevity, even in the most demanding industrial environments.
Conclusion ACE Lobe Pumps has established itself as a leader in the pump manufacturing industry, particularly in providing custom pumping solutions. With its wide range of products, versatile applications, and commitment to quality and innovation, ACE continues to revolutionize the way industries approach their pumping needs. Whether you’re in food processing, chemical manufacturing, or any other industry requiring reliable pumping solutions, ACE Lobe Pumps offers the expertise and products to elevate your operations to new heights of efficiency and productivity.
For more information about ACE lobe pumps and their custom pumping solutions, visit their website at https://acelobepump.com/ . Discover how ACE can transform your pumping processes and drive your business forward with cutting-edge pump technology.
